name: Eazy Contact Form
author: NLK plumbing

sections.description:
This is a very easy contact form with validation. Use shortcode [eazy_contact] for page & for widget [eazy_widget] to display form on page or use the widget to display contact form in sidebar.

Our Services as below:

  • Plumber Melbourne
  • Emergency Plumbing Melbourne
  • Blocked Drains Melbourne
  • Best Plumber Adelaide
  • Plumbing Adelaide
  • Blocked Drains Melbourne
sections.installation:
1. Upload Eazy Contact From to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use [shortcode] shortcode to add contact form in post and pages.
  4. Use [shortcode email_to=”Admin Email ID”] to change email from admin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Eazy Contact From to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use [shortcode] shortcode to add contact form in post and pages.
  4. Use [shortcode email_to=”Admin Email ID”] to change email from admin

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
